titleStmt.title: Breife meditations of the Most Holy Sacrament and of preparation, for receuing the same. And of some other thinges apertaining to the greatnes and deuotion of so worthy a misterie. Composed in Italian by the rev. father Luca Pinelli of the Societie of Iesus.
titleStmt.author: Pinelli, Luca, 1542-1607.
Garnet, Henry, 1555-1606.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
